  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, int hitPoints, int stamina)
      Constructor for the Player class.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player.
      displayChar - The character used to display the player on the map.
      hitPoints - The initial hit points of the player.
      stamina - The initial stamina of the player.

  • Method Details

    • recoverStamina

      public void recoverStamina()
      Method to recover player's stamina. It increases the player's stamina by 1% of the maximum stamina if it's below the maximum.

    • setRespawner

      public void setRespawner​(Respawner respawner)

    • getIntrinsicWeapon

      public IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
      Retrieve the intrinsic weapon of the player.
      Overrides:
      getIntrinsicWeapon in class Actor
      Returns:
      An IntrinsicWeapon representing the player's default attack.

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Override of the playTurn method to handle player's turn. This method first recovers the player's stamina, and then displays a menu of available actions for the player.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - Collection of possible Actions for the player.
      lastAction - The Action the player took last turn.
      map - The map containing the player.
      display - The I/O object to which messages may be written.
      Returns:
      The chosen Action to perform during this turn.

    • unconscious

      public java.lang.String unconscious​(GameMap map)
      Override of the unconscious method to handle the player's unconscious state. This method displays a special "You Died" message line by line, simulating a dramatic effect, and then invokes the super method to handle the unconscious state.
      Overrides:
      unconscious in class Actor
      Parameters:
      map - The GameMap in which the player is located.
      Returns:
      The result of handling the player's unconscious state from the superclass.

    • unconscious

      public java.lang.String unconscious​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Override of the unconscious method to handle player's unconscious state. It displays a special message and then invokes the super method to handle the unconscious state.
      Overrides:
      unconscious in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor representing the player.
      map - The map containing the player.
      Returns:
      The result of handling the player's unconscious state.

    • dropRunes

      public void dropRunes​(Location deathLocation)
      Drops runes matching the value of the player's balance at time of death at the location of death
      Parameters:
      deathLocation - the location the player dies

    • respawnActor

      public void respawnActor​(Location deathLocation)
      Calls Respawner's respawn method. Over-ridden from Respawnable interface
      Specified by:
      respawnActor in interface Respawnable
      Parameters:
      deathLocation - The location where the actor has died and needs to be respawned.
